Spec.title: lvl 96 (removed few life and dmg nodes)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x70FF70Occultist Death Aura + Caustic Arrow MF Build^7 (58% IIQ, 291% IIR)
^xFFFF77Prices at the moment when I bought these items (2-4 days before publishing video), they can be much higher after publishing because of higher demand!!!!^7 ^7^7^7 (especially low supply ones with corrupted implicits or same combo of mods on gear and clusters etc)
^xFFFF77All gear, jewels, charms purchases were recorded. Check "Buying/Crafting" section in video, 8:47 timestamp ^7(will add link after publishing video)^7
No charms in 3.24, that's why no space for Grace aura anymore, but we still have 33k armor. No source of onslaught and bit lower suppression.
---^x70FF70Gear^7--- Weapon - 12 div (standard good bow for any chaos dot builds, preferably on base with 10% inc movement speed) Quiver - 10 div (2 dot multi mods or 1 dot multi + 40-50% inc dmg with bow skills) Helmet - 6 div (lot of rarity, suppress and life, preferably arm/eva base) Body - 2 div + 1.5 div to color 2R2G2B (can be without corrupted implicit, but it's 4.5% less dps) Gloves - 30c (Enfeeble on hit corrupted implicit) Boots - 100c (+1 lvl socketed gems, because we use auras here, so they get +1 lvl and also enlighten lvl 3 becomes lvl 4) Amulet - 15 div + 2 div for suffixes cannot be changed + 1.5 div anoint (can be 20+ dot multi and +1 lvl all or chaos gems) Ring1 - 5 div (buy rings after all other items and jewels, check how many res you need from them) Ring2 - 1 div (buy rings after all other items and jewels, check how many res you need from them) Belt - 1 div (inc item rarity corrupted implicit. Mageblood is very good for this build, much faster and more tanky)
---^x70FF70Flasks^7--- Granite Flask - 100c Other flasks (self-crafted) ~ 400 alts + 50 bauble
---^x70FF70Jewels^7--- Glorious Vanity (Xibaqua name) - 3 div (number can be different, 6903 is good, but it's not only one. Good numbers are: 4003, 5469, 634, 6990, 4376, 4978, 4678 and many others) Watcher's Eye - 6 div (we need only dot multi with malevolence, other mod can be any. Combo with determination or grace would be good, but they are much more expensive) That Which Was Taken - 10 div (it's not mandatory to have same mods, with this setup I don't rly need ele res from it, so can be solo suppress only, but it's good to have source of onslaught) Crimson jewels - 120c + 30c (just life and dmg. Plus res or attributes if needed) Large Clusters - 4 div + 4 div Medium Clusters (1st self-rolled with c) - 88c + 2 div + 1.5 div + 60c (we need Student of Decay on each of them to cap chaos res) Small Clusters - 2 div + 2 div (3 passives, 25% inc effect of small passives, reserv efficiency for Malevolence and Grace)
---^x70FF70Gems^7--- Vaal Caustic Arrow 20/20 - 60c Grace 21/0 - 1 div Determination 21/0 - 1 div 2x Enlighten lvl 3 - 3 div + 3 div Empower lvl 4 - 6.5 div 2x Awak Void Manipulastion - 1.5 div + 1.5 div 2x Awak Swift Affliction 5/20 - 2 div + 2 div Awak Inc AoE - 7.5 div Awak Blasphemy - 1 div Awak Vicious Projectiles 5/20 - 1 div Efficacy 21/20 - 3 div Withering Step 21/20 - 1 div Conc Effect 21/20 - 3.5 div Other gems - 245c
^x70FF70Total cost: ^7141 div

Skill.label: Molten Shell, Withering Step + Automation Support
